content: kicking bag for babies by annika lange jaspers pucksack size 41 5 cm 16 3 long 29 cm 11 4 wide only 17 5 cm 6 8 wide at the waistband like the cuff on a sock newborn to 6 months yarn approx 90 grams 4-ply sock yarn leftovers e g lana grossa cotton needle size us 2 ½ / 3 00 mm gauge 27 5 stitches 39 row 10 cm x 10 cm or 4 square in stockinette stitch stitch guide for waistband row 1 k2 p2 repeat till end of row row 2 mini-cable k2tog without slipping sts from left needle then knit first st again then slip both sts off needle p2 repeat mini-cable p2 till end of row row 3 k2 p2 repeat till end of row row 4 k2 p2 repeat till end of row row 5 k2 p2 repeat till end of row repeat row 2 through 5 pattern for kicking bag cast on 128 stitches and join for working in the round start knitting the waistband until bag measures 8 cm approx 3 continue knitting in stockinette stitch until the bag measures approx 41 42 cm 16 5 finish with the 3-needle-bind-off or graft stitches together weave in ends wash it before you give it away and - if desired - block it gently my color repeat repeat 3 times 10 row red 10 row self-striping sock yarn 1 10 row self-striping sock yarn 2 10 row self-striping sock yarn 1 10 row self-striping sock yarn 2 written by annika lange june 27 2008 for private use only
